bug.short_desc: [1.8][compiler][codegen] IncompatibleClassChangeError when running code with lambda method.

long_desc.thetext:
Fix and test released here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=2344c6f119f16ef1a15c1ba0cc48698ff4c5a21a
Turns out the bridging is another piece of magic automatically handled by the meta factory. The problem was that the indy call was referencing the defining class BiFunction, but the metafactory expects the instantiation type BinaryOperator.
